nodes.bodyText:
javafx is typically not used in this repo - and leads to build incompatibilities for some environments.
Maybe change this to "org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair" ? @yingsu00 @mbasmanova
@ClarenceThreepwood Nice catch. Yes, we shouldn't use javafx.util.Pair. org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair is better.
I've added a patch here that fixes this issue. Please take a look
